name: Trix and the Horny Tower - Adult Art Pack
name_original: Trix and the Horny Tower - Adult Art Pack
description:
Wanna Trix and the Horny Tower H-scenes in your pocket?

This pack contains Trix and the Horny Tower H-scenes in HD WITHOUT backgrounds and a PDF document with almost 30 pages from the backstage of the game. You'll be able to check how we created the characters, their sketches, some mistakes we made, and how the game was (in terms of art) before its remake. In other words, you'll get:

  • H-scenes in the original resolution (1720x1316);
  • A PDF document with almost 30 pages with the backstage of the game including sketches from the h-scenes, characters' art process, art mistakes, and much more!
